name: Tortoise in the Secure Shell
description:
Save your e-pet in this summer blockbuster hacking extravaganza.

Prepare to HACK!

Warning: not safe for tortoises

Best comedy hacking game of the century
    - Cyberverse e-zine, February 21XX The bold choice not to include any audio at all makes for a disquieting experience.
    - Some Game Review Magazine
